newsitem.title: CANADA: Seven reported killed in Canada bus crash.
newsitem.headline: Seven reported killed in Canada bus crash.

text.p: At least seven people were killed and several others were injured early on Saturday when a passenger bus collided with a tractor trailer on a remote stretch of Alberta highway, the Canadian Press reported.
CP said the bus, which carries about 50 passengers when full, burst into flames and was consumed by the fire.
Rescue crews were on the scene and witnesses described bodies lying in the ditch beside the road.
The crash occurred about 200 km (120 miles) northwest of Edmonton.
The bus was en route to Edmonton when it was hit head-on by the truck, which may have been trying to pass at the time, witnesses said.
